name: Bijou Blu IV and Cryotherapy
address: 10 Farrell St Suite 1, South Burlington, VT 05403
description: Offers whole body cryotherapy, cryo facials, IV drip therapy, infrared therapy, and compression therapy. They also offer specialized packages and daily specials

name: Active Cryo Spa
address: (Specific address not found, but located in Burlington, VT)
description: Specializes in cryotherapy services for body sculpting, fat reduction, weight loss, enhanced energy, and improved sleep. They offer whole-body and localized cryotherapy, as well as cryo-facials

name: The Spa at Spruce Peak
address: (Specific address not found, but located in Stowe, VT area)
description: Offers cryotherapy, including the Cryo T-Shock System for body slimming, face contouring, and toning. They emphasize it as an all-natural, non-invasive treatment

name: The EDGE Sports & Fitness (Wellness Lounge)
address: 142 West Twin Oaks, South Burlington, VT
description: Features a CRYO Lounge offering cold therapy for muscle relief, along with HYDRO Massage beds. It's described as the first CRYO Lounge in Vermont
